thread.section_title: 1st Art-gallery Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of 1st Art-gallery | www.1st-art-gallery.com
thread.title: Cindy Berry

author: Cindy Berry
title: Cindy Berry
text: I got a beautiful copy of an original that is delightful to look at.I was kept informed how the painting was progressing and was sent photos of it when it was finished. They asked for my comments and were willing to correct anything that I was not happy with (which was only a minor detail).The painting arrived in good time once it was finished and was extremely well packed. If you are hesitating, I advise you to go ahead. Their standards are very high and you will not be disappointed.
